descriptionHtml:
WARNING: IF YOU DON'T WANT AN OVERPOWERED DAGGER, DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS MOD.

story: 
There are rumors, everybody in Skyrim knows them, the dagger that slayed Uriel Septim VII is in Skyrim. And everybody heard the legends, about the dagger. The dagger could stop everything it should touch, then, now or in the future, and when your are touched, you can't move for a little amount of time, or forever. But everyone knows one thing sure about the mysterious dagger, the evil within the dagger is even more evil then the Daedric Princes. 

You can get the dagger, called A King's Nightmare, on three ways. 
1. You can use console commands, the most unfair way, have fun finding the dagger; 
2. If you kill a very annoying person of the Dark Brotherhood, I think you know who I mean: 
3. If you have ebony smithing, you can craft the dagger 

It is also possible to improve the dagger, you do need the skill Arcane Blacksmith. 

If you have something to say about this mod, write it in the comments. 
P.S. I have also added something else, if you have the dagger, have fun with finding out what i mean.
author: SlayerOfDragons
